name: My Futa Girlfriend 🔞
description:
My Futa Girlfriend 🔞 - this is a game for futanari lovers! If you like power play, strong feminine characters, and deeply flawed people, we're off to a good start! If you also like dominant girls with huge dicks, then we have truly excellent news for you!
My Futa Girlfriend 🔞 is a traditional puzzle game that anyone can easily figure out. You have to solve a puzzle to get a reward and unlock next level. If you are only interested in girls there is the possibility of skipping the level. Perfect for relaxing after a hard day at work or a tiring gaming session.

Features

  • Horse Penis

  • Flacid Penis

  • True Futa (Penis + Pussy)

  • Hyperballs

  • Cocktail/Dicktail

  • Can be played with one hand
